extendedInfo.description: The EAACI-WAO Congress 2013 is a joint congress organised by the European Academy of Allergy and Clinical Immunology and the World Allergy Organization. The EAACI-WAO Congress 2013 offers a unique opportunity to learn about new researches in the field of allergy and exchange experience with professionals in the field of allergy and clinical immunology.The Congress brings together the worldâs leading experts in allergy, asthma and immunology during the EAACI-WAO World Allergy and Asthma Congress 2013 in Milan. Close to 300 international speakers will participate in Milan.
